info.title: Organisations API
info.description: API for the management of organisations and their contact details.

get.summary: Returns the data for one organisation by organisationId
get.description:
Requires role: ROLE_ORGANISATIONS_MIGRATION.
      Used to get the details for one organisation.

parameters.name: organisationId
parameters.description: The internal ID for an organisation.

200.description: Returning the details of the organisation

404.description: No organisation with the requested ID was found

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

put.summary: Updates an organisation with altereed or additional details
put.description:
Requires role: ROLE_ORGANISATIONS_MIGRATION.
      Used to update an organisation.

parameters.name: organisationId
parameters.description: The internal ID for the organisation.

200.description: Successfully updated the organisation

404.description: The organisation was not found

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

delete.summary: Deletes one organisation by internal ID
delete.description:
Requires role: ROLE_ORGANISATIONS_MIGRATION.
      Used to delete an organisation.

parameters.name: organisationId
parameters.description: The internal ID for the organisation.

404.description: No organisation with the requested ID was found

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

get.summary: Returns the data for one organisation web address by ID
get.description:
Requires role: ROLE_ORGANISATIONS_MIGRATION.
      Used to get the details for one organisation web address.

parameters.name: organisationWebId
parameters.description: The internal ID for an organisation web address.

200.description: Returning the details of the organisation web address

404.description: No organisation web address with the requested ID was found

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

put.summary: Updates an organisation web address with altered or additional details
put.description:
Requires role: ROLE_ORGANISATIONS_MIGRATION.
      Used to update an organisation's web address.

parameters.name: organisationWebId
parameters.description: The internal ID for the organisation web address.

200.description: Successfully updated the organisation's web address

404.description: The organisation web address was not found

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

delete.summary: Deletes one organisation organisation web address by internal ID
delete.description:
Requires role: ROLE_ORGANISATIONS_MIGRATION.
      Used to delete an organisation web address.

parameters.name: organisationWebId
parameters.description: The internal ID for the organisation web address.

204.description: Successfully deleted the organisation web address

404.description: No organisation web address with the requested ID was found

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

get.summary: Returns the organisation types for an organisation by ID
get.description:
Requires role: ROLE_ORGANISATIONS_MIGRATION.
      Used to get the organisation types for this organisation.

parameters.name: organisationId
parameters.description: The internal organisation ID.

200.description: Returning the details of the organisation types

404.description: No organisation with the requested ID was found

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

put.summary: Updates the organisation types for a given organisation ID
put.description:
Requires role: ROLE_ORGANISATIONS_MIGRATION.
      Used to update an organisation's types.

parameters.name: organisationId
parameters.description: The internal organisation ID.

200.description: Successfully updated the organisation's types

404.description: The organisation ID was not found

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

get.summary: Returns the data for one organisation phone number by ID
get.description:
Requires role: ROLE_ORGANISATIONS_MIGRATION.
      Used to get the details for one organisation phone number.

parameters.name: organisationPhoneId
parameters.description: The internal ID for an organisation phone number.

200.description: Returning the details of the organisation phone number

404.description: No organisation phone number with the requested ID was found

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

put.summary: Updates an organisation phone number with altered or additional details
put.description:
Requires role: ROLE_ORGANISATIONS_MIGRATION.
      Used to update an organisation's phone number.

parameters.name: organisationPhoneId
parameters.description: The internal ID for the organisation phone number.

200.description: Successfully updated the organisation's phone number

404.description: The organisation phone number was not found

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

delete.summary: Deletes one organisation organisation phone by internal ID
delete.description:
Requires role: ROLE_ORGANISATIONS_MIGRATION.
      Used to delete an organisation phone number.

parameters.name: organisationPhoneId
parameters.description: The internal ID for the organisation phone number.

204.description: Successfully deleted the organisation phone number

404.description: No organisation phone number with the requested ID was found

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

get.summary: Returns the data for one organisation email address by ID
get.description:
Requires role: ROLE_ORGANISATIONS_MIGRATION.
      Used to get the details for one organisation email address.

parameters.name: organisationEmailId
parameters.description: The internal ID for an organisation email address.

200.description: Returning the details of the organisation email address

404.description: No organisation email address with the requested ID was found

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

put.summary: Updates an organisation email address with altered or additional details
put.description:
Requires role: ROLE_ORGANISATIONS_MIGRATION.
      Used to update an organisation's email address.

parameters.name: organisationEmailId
parameters.description: The internal ID for the organisation email address.

200.description: Successfully updated the organisation's email address

404.description: The organisation email address was not found

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

delete.summary: Deletes one organisation organisation email address by internal ID
delete.description:
Requires role: ROLE_ORGANISATIONS_MIGRATION.
      Used to delete an organisation email address.

parameters.name: organisationEmailId
parameters.description: The internal ID for the organisation email address.

204.description: Successfully deleted the organisation email address

404.description: No organisation email address with the requested ID was found

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

get.summary: Returns the data for one organisation address by ID
get.description:
Requires role: ROLE_ORGANISATIONS_MIGRATION.
      Used to get the details for one organisation address.

parameters.name: organisationAddressId
parameters.description: The internal ID for an organisation address

200.description: Returning the details of the organisation address

400.description: The request has invalid or missing fields

404.description: No organisation address with the requested ID was found

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

put.summary: Updates an organisation address with altered or additional details
put.description:
Requires role: ROLE_ORGANISATIONS_MIGRATION.
      Used to update an organisation's address.

parameters.name: organisationAddressId
parameters.description: The internal ID for the organisation address.

200.description: Successfully updated the organisation's address

404.description: The organisation address was not found

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

delete.summary: Deletes one organisation organisation address by internal ID
delete.description:
Requires role: ROLE_ORGANISATIONS_MIGRATION.
      Used to delete an organisation address.

parameters.name: organisationAddressId
parameters.description: The internal ID for the organisation address.

404.description: No organisation address with the requested ID was found

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

get.summary: Returns the data for one organisation address phone number by ID
get.description:
Requires role: ROLE_ORGANISATIONS_MIGRATION.
      Used to get the details for one organisation address phone number by ID.

parameters.name: organisationAddressPhoneId
parameters.description: The internal ID for an organisation address-linked phone number

200.description: Returning the details of the organisation address-linked phone number

400.description: The request has invalid or missing fields

404.description: No organisation address number with the requested ID was found

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

put.summary: Updates an organisation address-linked phone number with altered or additional details
put.description:
Requires role: ROLE_ORGANISATIONS_MIGRATION.
      Used to update an organisation's address-linked phone number.

parameters.name: organisationAddressPhoneId
parameters.description: The internal ID for the organisation address-linked phone number.

200.description: Successfully updated the organisation's address-linked phone number

404.description: The organisation, address or phone number was not found

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

delete.summary: Deletes one organisation address-linked phone number by internal ID
delete.description:
Requires role: ROLE_ORGANISATIONS_MIGRATION.
      Used to delete an organisation's address-linked phone number by internal ID.

parameters.name: organisationAddressPhoneId
parameters.description: The internal ID for the organisation address-linked phone number.

204.description: Successfully deleted the organisation address phone number

404.description: No organisation address-linked phone number with the requested ID was found

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

post.summary: Creates a new organisation with a specified ID
post.description:
Requires role: ROLE_ORGANISATIONS_MIGRATION.
      Used to create a new organisation.

400.description: The request has invalid or missing fields

409.description: Conflict. The organisation ID provided in the request already exists

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

post.summary: Creates a new web address and links it to an organisation
post.description:
Requires role: ROLE_ORGANISATIONS_MIGRATION.
      Used to create a new organisation web address.

201.description: Successfully created the organisation web address

400.description: The request has invalid or missing fields

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

post.summary: Creates a new phone number and links it to an organisation
post.description:
Requires role: ROLE_ORGANISATIONS_MIGRATION.
      Used to create a new organisation phone number.

201.description: Successfully created the organisation phone number

400.description: The request has invalid or missing fields

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

post.summary: Creates a new email address and links it to an organisation
post.description:
Requires role: ROLE_ORGANISATIONS_MIGRATION.
      Used to create a new organisation email address.

201.description: Successfully created the organisation email address

400.description: The request has invalid or missing fields

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

post.summary: Creates a new address and links it to an organisation
post.description:
Requires role: ROLE_ORGANISATIONS_MIGRATION.
      Used to create a new organisation address.

400.description: The request has invalid or missing fields

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

post.summary: Creates a new address-linked phone number for an organisation
post.description:
Requires role: ROLE_ORGANISATIONS_MIGRATION.
      Used to create a new address-linked phone number for an organisation.

201.description: Successfully created the address-linked phone number for an organisation

400.description: The request has invalid or missing fields

404.description: The organisation or address was not found

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

post.description: Creates a new organisation in DPS but does not currently synchronise to NOMIS. Deprecated until this 2-way sync is in place.

400.description: The request has invalid or missing fields

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

post.description: Migrate an organisation from NOMIS with all of its associated data. If an organisation with the same id id already exists it will be replaced

200.description: The organisation and associated data was created successfully

400.description: The request failed validation with invalid or missing data supplied

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

get.description: Get a paged list of existing organisation IDs to reconcile against

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Zero-based page index (0..N)

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The size of the page to be returned

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property,(asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

200.description: Pageable organisation IDs returned

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

get.summary: Return the reference data available for group key.
get.description: Endpoint to return reference data for a provided group key. Sorted by display order then description by default.

parameters.name: groupCode
parameters.description: The group code of the reference codes to load

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort configuration - default displayOrder, description

parameters.name: activeOnly
parameters.description: Whether to only return active codes or not, defaults to true

200.description: List of reference data codes/values

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

get.description: Gets a organisation by their id

200.description: Found the organisation

404.description: No organisation with that id could be found

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

get.description: Gets a summary of an organisation by their id. Includes primary address and any business phone number for that address.

200.description: Found the organisation

404.description: No organisation with that id could be found

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

get.description: Search all organisations by their name

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: Search criteria

parameters.name: pageable
parameters.description: Pageable configurations

200.description: Organisations searched successfully. There may be no results.

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

organisationId.description: The organisation ID AKA the corporate ID from NOMIS

programmeNumber.description: The programme number for the organisation, stored as FEI_NUMBER in NOMIS

vatNumber.description: The VAT number for the organisation, if known

caseloadId.description: The id of the caseload for this organisation, this is an agency id in NOMIS

active.description: Whether the organisation is active or not

deactivatedDate.description: The date the organisation was deactivated, EXPIRY_DATE in NOMIS

updatedTime.description: Timestamp when the entry was updated

deactivatedDate.description: The date this organisation was deactivated

createdTime.description: Timestamp when the organisation was created

updatedTime.description: Timestamp when the organisation was last updated

SyncUpdateWebRequest.description: Request to update a web address for an organisation

updatedTime.description: The update timestamp

SyncWebResponse.description: Response object for web address changes via sync

organisationWebAddressId.description: The ID for this web address

organisationId.description: The organisation ID it is linked to

createdTime.description: The timestamp created

updatedTime.description: Timestamp last updated

createdTime.description: The created timestamp

updatedTime.description: The updated timestamp

SyncUpdateTypesRequest.description: Request to update the list of types assigned to an organisation

types.description: The list of organisation types (will replace the current types)

SyncTypesResponse.description: Response object for an organisation types update

organisationId.description: The organisation ID the updates refer to

types.description: The list of types updated on the organisation

SyncUpdatePhoneRequest.description: Request to update a phone number for an organisation

organisationId.description: The organisation ID this this number is linked to

updatedTime.description: The timestamp the phone number was updated

SyncPhoneResponse.description: Response object for phone number changes via sync

organisationPhoneId.description: The ID for this telephone number

organisationId.description: The organisation ID this telephone number is linked with

createdTime.description: The timestamp of when this phone number was created

updatedBy.description: User who last updated this phone number

updatedTime.description: Timestamp last updated

SyncUpdateEmailRequest.description: Request to update an email address for an organisation

updatedTime.description: The update timestamp

SyncEmailResponse.description: Response object for email address changes via sync

organisationEmailId.description: The ID for this email address

organisationId.description: The organisation ID it is linked to

createdTime.description: The timestamp created

updatedTime.description: Timestamp last updated

SyncUpdateAddressRequest.description: Request to update an address for an organisation

updatedTime.description: The update timestamp

SyncAddressResponse.description: Response object for organisation address changes via sync

organisationId.description: The organisation ID it is linked to

createdTime.description: The timestamp created

updatedTime.description: Timestamp last updated

SyncUpdateAddressPhoneRequest.description: Request to update an organisation's address-specific phone number

updatedBy.description: The username of the person who made the update

updatedTime.description: The time when the update was made

organisationAddressPhoneId.description: Unique identifier for the address-specific phone number

organisationAddressId.description: Unique identifier for the address to which this phone number is linked

organisationPhoneId.description: Unique identifier for the phone record

organisationId.description: Unique identifier for the organisation linked to this address

createdTime.description: Timestamp when the entry was created

updatedTime.description: Timestamp when the entry was updated

SyncCreateOrganisationRequest.description: Request to create a new organisation

organisationId.description: The organisation ID AKA the corporate ID from NOMIS

programmeNumber.description: The programme number for the organisation, stored as FEI_NUMBER in NOMIS

vatNumber.description: The VAT number for the organisation, if known

caseloadId.description: The id of the caseload for this organisation, this is an agency id in NOMIS

active.description: Whether the organisation is active or not

deactivatedDate.description: The date the organisation was deactivated, EXPIRY_DATE in NOMIS

createdTime.description: Timestamp when the entry was created

updatedTime.description: Timestamp when the entry was updated

SyncCreateWebRequest.description: Request to create a new web address for an organisation

createdTime.description: The creation timestamp

SyncCreatePhoneRequest.description: Request to create a new phone number for an organisation

organisationId.description: The organisation ID this telephone number is linked with

createdTime.description: The timestamp of when this phone number was created

SyncCreateEmailRequest.description: Request to create a new email address for an organisation

createdTime.description: The creation timestamp

SyncCreateAddressRequest.description: Request to create a new address for an organisation

createdTime.description: The creation timestamp

SyncCreateAddressPhoneRequest.description: Request to create an address-linked phone number for an organisation

organisationAddressId.description: Unique identifier for the address to link this number with

createdTime.description: The timestamp of when the phone was created

CreateOrganisationRequest.description: Request to create an new organisation

programmeNumber.description: The programme number for the organisation, stored as FEI_NUMBER in NOMIS

vatNumber.description: The VAT number for the organisation, if known

caseloadId.description: The id of the caseload for this organisation, this is an agency id in NOMIS

active.description: Whether the organisation is active or not

deactivatedDate.description: The date the organisation was deactivated, EXPIRY_DATE in NOMIS

createdTime.description: Timestamp when the entry was created

updatedTime.description: Timestamp when the entry was updated

OrganisationAddressDetails.description: An address related to an organisation with descriptions of all reference data

organisationAddressId.description: The id of the organisation address

addressType.description:
The type of address (optional).
      This is a coded value (from the group code ADDRESS_TYPE in reference data).
      The known values are HOME, WORK or BUS (business address).

addressTypeDescription.description: The description of the address type

primaryAddress.description: True if this is the primary address otherwise false

property.description: Building or house number or name

mailAddress.description: Flag to indicate whether mail is allowed to be sent to this address

serviceAddress.description: Flag to indicate whether the organisations service is provided at this address

startDate.description: The start date when this address is to be considered active from

endDate.description: The end date when this address is to be considered no longer active

noFixedAddress.description: Flag to indicate whether this address indicates no fixed address

comments.description: Any additional information or comments about the address

specialNeedsCode.description: Special needs code for this address from reference data ORG_ADDRESS_SPECIAL_NEEDS.

specialNeedsCodeDescription.description: The description of the special needs code

contactPersonName.description: The name of the contact person at this address

businessHours.description: The business hours of the address

phoneNumbers.description: Phone numbers associated with this address

createdBy.description: The id of the user who created the entry

createdTime.description: The timestamp of when the entry was created

updatedBy.description: The id of the user who last updated the entry

updatedTime.description: The timestamp of when the entry was last updated

OrganisationAddressPhoneDetails.description: An address-specific phone number for an organisation

organisationAddressPhoneId.description: Unique identifier for the address-specific phone number

organisationPhoneId.description: Unique identifier for the phone number

organisationAddressId.description: Unique identifier for the linked address

createdTime.description: Timestamp when the entry was created

updatedTime.description: Timestamp when the entry was updated

OrganisationDetails.description: Complete organisation data with reference data descriptions

programmeNumber.description: The programme number for the organisation, stored as FEI_NUMBER in NOMIS

vatNumber.description: The VAT number for the organisation, if known

caseloadId.description: The id of the caseload for this organisation, this is an agency id in NOMIS

caseloadPrisonName.description: The name of the prison that the caseloadId references

active.description: Whether the organisation is active or not

deactivatedDate.description: The date the organisation was deactivated, EXPIRY_DATE in NOMIS

organisationTypes.description: All organisation types associated with an organisation

phoneNumbers.description: All phone numbers associated with an organisation directly and not one of their addresses

emailAddresses.description: All email addresses associated with an organisation

webAddresses.description: All web addresses associated with an organisation

addresses.description: All addresses associated with an organisation

createdTime.description: Timestamp when the entry was created

updatedTime.description: Timestamp when the entry was updated

organisationEmailId.description: Unique identifier for the organisation email

createdTime.description: Timestamp when the entry was created

updatedTime.description: Timestamp when the entry was updated

OrganisationPhoneDetails.description: A phone number related to an organisation with descriptions of all reference data

organisationPhoneId.description: Unique identifier for the organisation phone

phoneTypeDescription.description: Description of the type of phone

createdTime.description: Timestamp when the entry was created

updatedTime.description: Timestamp when the entry was updated

organisationTypeDescription.description: Description of the type of organisation

createdTime.description: Timestamp when the entry was created

updatedTime.description: Timestamp when the entry was updated

OrganisationWebAddressDetails.description: Web address related to an organisation

organisationWebAddressId.description: Unique identifier for the organisation web address

createdTime.description: Timestamp when the entry was created

updatedTime.description: Timestamp when the entry was updated

noFixedAddress.description: If true this address should be considered as no fixed address

primaryAddress.description: If true this address should be considered as the primary residential address

mailAddress.description: If true this address should be considered for sending mail to

serviceAddress.description: If this is the service address for the organisation

specialNeedsCode.description: Special needs code for this address from SPECIAL_NEEDS in NOMIS.

contactPersonName.description: The name of the contact person at this address

businessHours.description: The business hours for this address

startDate.description: The date this address should be considered valid from

endDate.description: The date this address should be considered valid to

phoneNumbers.description: A list of phone numbers which are linked to this address

createDateTime.description: The data and time the record was created

createUsername.description: The username who created the row

modifyDateTime.description: The date and time the record was last amended

modifyUsername.description: The username who last modified the row

createDateTime.description: The data and time the record was created

createUsername.description: The username who created the row

modifyDateTime.description: The date and time the record was last amended

modifyUsername.description: The username who last modified the row

type.description: Type of phone number (from reference data)

createDateTime.description: The data and time the record was created

createUsername.description: The username who created the row

modifyDateTime.description: The date and time the record was last amended

modifyUsername.description: The username who last modified the row

MigrateOrganisationRequest.description: Request to migrate an organisation/corporate and all of its sub-elements from NOMIS into this service

programmeNumber.description: The programme number for the organisation, stored as FEI_NUMBER in NOMIS

vatNumber.description: The VAT number for the organisation, if known

caseloadId.description: The id of the caseload for this organisation, this is an agency id in NOMIS

active.description: Whether the organisation is active or not

deactivatedDate.description: The date the organisation was deactivated, EXPIRY_DATE in NOMIS

organisationTypes.description: The types of the organisation, CORPORATE_TYPES in NOMIS.

phoneNumbers.description: Phone numbers associated directly with the organisation and it's addresses

webAddresses.description: Web addresses associated with the organisation

createDateTime.description: The data and time the record was created

createUsername.description: The username who created the row

modifyDateTime.description: The date and time the record was last amended

modifyUsername.description: The username who last modified the row

type.description: Type of organisation from reference data

createDateTime.description: The data and time the record was created

createUsername.description: The username who created the row

modifyDateTime.description: The date and time the record was last amended

modifyUsername.description: The username who last modified the row

nomisWebAddressId.description: Unique web address ID in NOMIS

createDateTime.description: The data and time the record was created

createUsername.description: The username who created the row

modifyDateTime.description: The date and time the record was last amended

modifyUsername.description: The username who last modified the row

nomisId.description: The unique ID for this piece of data provided in the request

dpsId.description: The unique ID created in the DPS contacts service

organisation.description: The pair of IDs for this organisation in NOMIS

organisationTypes.description: List of organisation types that were created

phoneNumbers.description: List of Nomis and DPS IDs for phone numbers

emailAddresses.description: List of Nomis and DPS IDs for email addresses

webAddresses.description: List of Nomis and DPS IDs for web addresses

addresses.description: List of Nomis and DPS IDs for addresses

address.description: The pair of IDs for this organisation address in NOMIS

phoneNumbers.description: List of Nomis and DPS IDs for email addresses

ReferenceCode.description: Describes the details of a reference code

referenceCodeId.description: An internally-generated unique identifier for this reference code.

groupCode.description: The group name for related reference codes.

code.description: The code for this reference data

description.description: A fuller description of the reference code

displayOrder.description: The default order configured for the reference code, lowest number first.

isActive.description: Whether the reference code is still in use. Old reference codes are maintained for compatability with legacy data.

OrganisationSummary.description: The high level details of an organisation, it's primary address and any business phone number associated with that address.

organisationActive.description: Whether the organisation is currently active or not

flat.description: Flat number in the address, if any

property.description: Property name or number, if any

cityDescription.description: The description of the city code, if any

countyDescription.description: The description of county code, if any

countryDescription.description: The description of country code, if any

businessPhoneNumber.description: The business phone number for the primary address, if any

businessPhoneNumberExtension.description: The extension for the business phone number for the primary address, if any

name.description: Full or partial name of the organisation
